Articles.Content:
Hi all! 

I've got some doubles from Humble Bundles to games I already have. I've decided to get them off my Humble page, and you pocket the savings!

Note that each code will only work once, and these are all Steam codes, so if it doesn't work, you've probably been ninja'd.

List as follows:

CRUSADER KINGS II

\*gone\*

Crusader Kings II - Sons of Abraham (DLC)

\*gone\*

EDIT:

Sorry all, the codes are taken and used.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-16T13:08:11Z" title="05/16/2015 01:08  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 16, 2015</time> by kahlzun**

activated it, woo!

EDIT: dammit, this misleading post didn't work. Only 6 views and someone already tried ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

Damn Steam had to update, then failed tp launch multiple times...

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-16T12:40:46Z" title="05/16/2015 12:40  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 16, 2015</time> by SpaceXray**
O-o I thought I got it. Did the key worked twice?

> 
> O-o I thought I got it. Did the key worked twice?

Nope, damn you ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) I am always unlucky with Steam, damn thing starts up only from 5th try
Is that justt one or both?
You can't activate the DLC without having the base game.
I have some leftovers from past Humble Bundles as well. I guess I'll do a giveaway soon. (ME2, some Company of Heroes game, Sims 3, etc)

> 
> I have some leftovers from past Humble Bundles as well. I guess I'll do a giveaway soon. (ME2, some Company of Heroes game, Sims 3, etc)

You should consider having people PM you.

And I'd check the rules before doing so, I am not entirely sure this is allowed.

Edit: ask a moderator beforehand, I think it violates rule 2.2 i:

"Links that promote projects and/or products that are meant for the personal profit of either party, this specifically includes linking through ad.fly"

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-16T14:38:22Z" title="05/16/2015 02:38  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 16, 2015</time> by Starwhip**

> 
> You should consider having people PM you.
> And I'd check the rules before doing so, I am not entirely sure this is allowed.
> 
> Edit: ask a moderator beforehand, I think it violates rule 2.2 i:
> 
> "Links that promote projects and/or products that are meant for the personal profit of either party, this specifically includes linking through ad.fly"

I wouldn't say it breaks 2.2I, nobody's making any money & if promotion of products were disallowed then every video game thread on here would be in violation. There have also been giveaways in the past that haven't gotten any mod warnings.

> 
> I wouldn't say it breaks 2.2I, nobody's making any money & if promotion of products were disallowed then every video game thread on here would be in violation. There have also been giveaways in the past that haven't gotten any mod warnings.

Personally, I would check. Though that's my opinion.

After all, there is no harm in asking!
